body_html:
The Ubuntu Sanity test failed in do_bazel_nobuild. Which is caused by

ERROR: Config value hdfs is not defined in any .rc file
136
137
FAIL: bazel build --nobuild --config=hdfs --config=gcp -- //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/android/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/schema/...
138
  This is due to invalid BUILD files. See lines above for details.

It also impact other PR's (e.g., #19534) Sanity checks as well.

Not very familiar with how CI setup so I haven't been able to find a fix yet.

body:
The `Ubuntu Sanity` test failed in `do_bazel_nobuild`. Which is caused by
```
ERROR: Config value hdfs is not defined in any .rc file
136
137
FAIL: bazel build --nobuild --config=hdfs --config=gcp -- //tensorflow/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/android/... -//tensorflow/contrib/lite/schema/...
138
  This is due to invalid BUILD files. See lines above for details.
```

It also impact other PR's (e.g., #19534) Sanity checks as well.

Not very familiar with how CI setup so I haven't been able to find a fix yet.
